INFO.name: sql_query
INFO.value: SELECT ivoid, res_type, short_name, res_title, content_level, res_description, reference_url, creator_seq, content_type, source_format, source_value, region_of_regard, waveband, string_agg(COALESCE ( access_url , '' ), ':::py VO sep:::') AS access_urls, string_agg(COALESCE ( standard_id , '' ), ':::py VO sep:::') AS standard_ids, string_agg(COALESCE ( intf_type , '' ), ':::py VO sep:::') AS intf_types, string_agg(COALESCE ( intf_role , '' ), ':::py VO sep:::') AS intf_roles, alt_identifier FROM rr.resource NATURAL LEFT OUTER JOIN rr.capability NATURAL LEFT OUTER JOIN rr.interface NATURAL LEFT OUTER JOIN rr.alt_identifier WHERE ( ivoid = 'ivo://org.gavo.dc/flashheros/q/ssa' ) GROUP BY ivoid , res_type , short_name , res_title , content_level , res_description , reference_url , creator_seq , content_type , source_format , source_value , region_of_regard , waveband , alt_identifier LIMIT 20000

RESOURCE.INFO: ADQL query translated to local SQL (for debugging)

INFO.name: query
INFO.value: SELECT ivoid, res_type, short_name, res_title, content_level, res_description, reference_url, creator_seq, content_type, source_format, source_value, region_of_regard, waveband, ivo_string_agg(COALESCE(access_url, ''), ':::py VO sep:::') AS access_urls, ivo_string_agg(COALESCE(standard_id, ''), ':::py VO sep:::') AS standard_ids, ivo_string_agg(COALESCE(intf_type, ''), ':::py VO sep:::') AS intf_types, ivo_string_agg(COALESCE(intf_role, ''), ':::py VO sep:::') AS intf_roles, alt_identifier FROM rr.resource NATURAL LEFT OUTER JOIN rr.capability NATURAL LEFT OUTER JOIN rr.interface NATURAL LEFT OUTER JOIN rr.alt_identifier WHERE (ivoid = 'ivo://org.gavo.dc/flashheros/q/ssa') GROUP BY ivoid, res_type, short_name, res_title, content_level, res_description, reference_url, creator_seq, content_type, source_format, source_value, region_of_regard, waveband, alt_identifier

Name of a person or entity that produced a contributing resource

GROUP.name: note-cl
GROUP.DESCRIPTION: The terms are taken from the vocabulary http://ivoa.net/rdf/voresource/content_level.

GROUP.name: note-ct
GROUP.DESCRIPTION: The terms are taken from the vocabulary http://ivoa.net/rdf/voresource/content_type.

GROUP.name: note-w
GROUP.DESCRIPTION: The allowed values for waveband include: Radio, Millimeter, Infrared, Optical, UV, EUV, X-ray, Gamma-ray.

FIELD.name: ivoid
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Unambiguous reference to the resource conforming to the IVOA standard for identifiers.

FIELD.name: res_type
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Resource type (something like vg:authority, vs:catalogservice, etc).

FIELD.name: short_name
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: A short name or abbreviation given to something, for presentation in space-constrained fields (up to 16 characters).

FIELD.name: res_title
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The full name given to the resource.

FIELD.name: content_level
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: A hash-separated list of content levels specifying the intended audience.

FIELD.name: res_description
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: An account of the nature of the resource.

FIELD.name: reference_url
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: URL pointing to a human-readable document describing this resource.

FIELD.name: creator_seq
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The creator(s) of the resource in the order given by the resource record author, separated by semicolons.

FIELD.name: content_type
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: A hash-separated list of natures or genres of the content of the resource.

FIELD.name: source_format
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The format of source_value. This, in particular, can be ``bibcode''.

FIELD.name: source_value
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: A bibliographic reference from which the present resource is derived or extracted.

FIELD.name: region_of_regard
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: A single numeric value representing the angle, given in decimal degrees, by which a positional query against this resource should be ``blurred'' in order to get an appropriate match.

FIELD.name: waveband
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: A hash-separated list of regions of the electro-magnetic spectrum that the resource's spectral coverage overlaps with.

FIELD.name: alt_identifier
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: An identifier for the resource or an entity related to the resource in URI form.
